channel.title: God Wars [Solo] and Revenant Attacks [508] Origin-DreamPk
channel.description:
Hello MoparScape. :)
Since, i know this is quiet pathetic...:P Here are the two videos.
Help needed~
GFX for the Revenant Magic Attack :p
Fixed after Video~
All NPC's face you when they attack.
Revenant Does~
Use Mage, Ranged and Melee. Heals. Freezes opponent. Teleports on very low Hp. Aggressive, spots players.
Improvement needed on~
Mage~ Wrong GFX :p Ranged~ I did that lil' bolt :D Freeze~ Do the emote when frozen (Player)
[URL=http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=4uzbqw&s=5]Revenant Attacks (HD)[/URL]
Sorry about my talking :p I start walking at about 1:21
God Wars~
[URL=http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=30m3fck&s=5]God Wars (HD)[/URL]
Improved after Video~
NPC's face Player while attacking. The Boss only spawns after all the Guardians are defeated. Added proper drops, including big bones, herbs and Godsword Shards.
Help needed~
I've only been to God Wars once or twice. Any suggestions?
[B]BOTH THE VIDEO'S ARE HIGH DEFINITION![/B] [B]FOR YOUR AMUSEMENT I SPENT 1 HOUR UPLOADING :P[/B]
Any Suggestions, Questions, Or Comments, please post.
Originalpker~

Nice, get the two other commanders to face you…
Also Ukeys!

Plz i r need! Thr 2 gd i ned em!

item.title: God Wars [Solo] and Revenant Attacks [508] Origin-DreamPk
item.dc:creator: @originalpker originalpker
item.description:
@originalpker wrote:

[quote=“Gods army, post:7, topic:266251”]1st vid: to slow but good job, funny how he killed you

2nd vid: holy crap almost perfect… took you FOREVER to kill. thats how it should be. little weak but good.[/quote]

Thank you mate
I didn’t want it to be TOO easy, and also i added the correct Vengeance Rebound hit for NPC’s.
Somebody told me to make Vengeance for NPC’s hit 0-75 Randomly…
Got the right GFX and stuff now

Originalpker~

P.S- What do you mean weak?

Read full topic
